config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration option DATABASE_TO_LOWER is used to determine whether the database settings require converting identifiers to lower case. This is done by checking the databaseToLower setting in the database settings.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever an identifier needs to be converted to lower case in the code. The triggering frequency depends on the number of times identifiers are accessed and converted in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option DATABASE_TO_LOWER is on the performance and consistency of the system. If the setting is enabled, it will incur additional processing overhead to convert identifiers to lower case. This may impact the overall performance of the system, especially in scenarios where a large number of identifiers need to be converted.
